name: pdf-generator
description: AI Research Assistant - A web application that helps users conduct in-depth research using AI and generates comprehensive reports as downloadable PDFs

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist
